error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

newpassword.minlength: Your password is required to be at least 4 characters.
newpassword.maxlength: Your password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

email.minlength: Your email is required to be at least 5 characters.
email.maxlength: Your email cannot be longer than 50 characters.

error.tooManyDecimals: Please enter at most two decimal places.
error.invalidGrade: Please enter the grade as a positive number, percentage, or letter.
error.formatMismatch: Please enter all values in the same format.
error.boundaryMismatch: The highest achievable grade must be better than the lowest passing grade.
error.outOfRange: The grade must be between the highest achievable and lowest passing grades.

confirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this document? This action cannot be undone.

tooltip.remove: Remove this file from the upload list
tooltip.delete: Delete this file from the server

duplicate.title: Document already exists

replacement.title: Replace existing file
replacement.message: You have already uploaded a file. Do you want to replace it with the new file?

confirmDialog.message: Are you sure you want to submit your application? Once published, further edits will NOT be possible.

validation.postalCode: Please enter a valid postal code for the selected country.

tooltip.bachelorGradeUpperLimit: Enter the highest achievable grade in your Bachelor's degree grading system (e.g. 1.0 in Germany).
tooltip.bachelorGradeLowerLimit: Enter the lowest passing grade in your Bachelor's degree grading system (e.g. 4.0 in Germany)
tooltip.bachelorGrade: Enter your final Bachelor's Grade according to your institution's grading system.
tooltip.masterGradeUpperLimit: Enter the highest achievable grade in your Master's degree grading system (e.g. 1.0 in Germany).
tooltip.masterGradeLowerLimit: Enter the lowest passing grade in your Master's degree grading system (e.g. 4.0 in Germany)
tooltip.masterGrade: Enter your final Master's Grade according to your institution's grading system.
tooltip.filenamePrivacy: File names stay private and are not visible during the application process.

label.motivation: What is your motivation to take this position?
label.experiences: If you already worked in research topics, what are your experiences?

tooltip.desiredStartDate: Choose the preferred Date when you would like to start the position.
tooltip.motivation: Explain how this position aligns with your career plans or research interests.
tooltip.skills: Share your research background in order to help us see how your experience fits the role.
tooltip.experiences: Highlight results or insights that shaped your research experience.

floatlabel.experiences: Discuss previous research projects, theses or publications

sublabel.skills: Why are you a good fit for this program or lab?
sublabel.experiences: Include your role, methods used, key findings, subjects, projects, ...

doctoralRequirements.title: German Doctoral Position Requirements
doctoralRequirements.text: Please ensure you have informed yourself about the requirements for a German Doctoral Position.

toastError.detail: Please confirm that you have informed yourself about the requirements for a German Doctoral Position to proceed.

dialogs.withdrawMessage: Are you sure you want to withdraw this application? Once withdrawn, it will no longer be visible to the professor. This action can NOT be undone!
dialogs.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this draft? This action can NOT be undone!
